summary.span: 用下划线来指定用作访问键的字符。

span.span: Specifies with an underscore the character that is used as the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果内容包含多个下划线字符，则只会将第一个下划线字符转换为， 其他下划线将显示为普通文本。If your content has multiple underscore characters, only the first one is converted into an ; the other underscores appear as normal text. 如果要转换为访问键的下划线不是第一个下划线，请在要转换的下划线前面使用两个连续的下划线。If the underscore that you want converted to the access key is not the first underscore, use two consecutive underscores for any underscores that precede the one that you want to convert. 例如，以下代码包含一个访问键，并显示为 _Hello**W**orld：For example, the following code contains an access key and displays as _Hello**W**orld: ``` __Hello_World ``` 由于 H 前面的下划线为 double，因此 W key 注册为访问键。Because the underscore that precedes H is a double, the W key registers as the access key. 若要 在控件样式中用作内容宿主，请 在中设置 ，如以下示例所示：To use as a content host in a control style, set in the , as this example shows: ``` ``` ## Examples 您可以使用 标记创建一个 ，但不需要标记。You can use the tag to create an ; however, a tag is not necessary. 下面的示例演示如何使用和不使用标记来创建访问密钥 。The following example shows how to create an access key with and without the tag. [!code-xaml[AccessText#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AccessText/CS/pane1.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *双精度**Double* 值的字符串表示形式 。A string representation of a value. 此值被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量值。This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，你可以将值指定为 `1` 。For example, you can specify a value of `1`. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 一个 *双精度* 值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 、 `pt` 。A *double* value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **注意** 在许多情况下，你可以将双精度型设置为 `Auto` ; 但是，不能将此属性设置为 `Auto` 。**Note** In many cases, you can set a double to `Auto`; however, you cannot set this property to `Auto`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以更改控件中文本的外观 。The following example shows how to set properties to change the appearance of the text in an control. [!code-xaml[AccessText#AccessTextProps](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AccessText/CS/pane1.xaml#accesstextprops)]

summary.span: 获取或设置每个行框的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line box.

value.span: 一个指定每个行框的高度的双精度值。

span.span: A double that specifies the height of each line box.

value.span: 此值必须大于或等于 0.0034 且等于或小于 160000。

span.span: This value must be equal to or greater than 0.0034 and equal to or less then 160000.

value.span: 如果值 (等效于 " 自动 ") 的属性值，则会导致自动根据当前的字体特征确定行高。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of Auto) causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此值不会更改关联文本的高度;相反，它将更改包含它的框。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; instead, it changes the box that contains it. 若要更改文本大小，请使用 属性。To change the size of the text, use the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 值的字符串表示形式 。A string representation of a value. 此值被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量值。This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，你可以将值指定为 `1` 。For example, you can specify a value of `1`. " 属性值" 一节中提到的相同范围限制在此处适用。The same range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply here. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 一个 *双精度* 值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 、 `pt` 。A *double* value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px *Auto**Auto* 自动确定行高。An automatic line height determination. 如果以编程方式设置 *自动* 值，则它的值对应于 。If you programmatically set the *Auto* value, its value corresponds to .

summary.span: 获取或设置如何强制应用 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets how the property is enforced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制为文本保留的行框。 properties control the line box that is reserved for text. 允许用户设置一个 "高度" 建议。 allows users to set a suggestion of height. 定义如何 强制执行。 defines how the is enforced. 可以将属性设置 为 或 。You can set the property to or . - 该值将行增加到行中最高的对象。The value increases the line to the tallest object in the line. 它可确保没有项 overdraws 或被剪裁。It ensures that no item overdraws or is trimmed. - 值强制 对所有行使用值。The value enforces a value on all lines. 如果该 属性没有提供足够的空间，则文本要么 overdrawn，要么被剪裁掉。If the property does not provide sufficient space, the text is either overdrawn or trimmed. 发生的情况取决于 值。Which occurs depends on the value. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

summary.span: 获取或设置 元素所显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the element.

value.span: 不带第一个下划线字符的文本。

span.span: The text without the first underscore character.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用 属性为元素提供文本，则不会创建访问密钥 。An access key is not created if you use the property to supply text for an element. 此属性在内部使用，用于确定访问键显示的文本。This property is used internally to determine the text that is displayed by the access key. 您可以使用此属性来设置不包含助记键 (带下划线字符的其他文本) 或检索访问密钥文本。You can use this property to set additional text that does not contain the mnemonic (underlined character) or to retrieve the access key text. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *_accessText**_accessText* 一个包含下划线字符的字符串。A string that contains the underscore character. 此值变为 用于处理 *对象*的访问键的。This value becomes an that handles access keys for the *object*. 访问键是紧跟在下划线后面的字符。The access key is the character that immediately follows the underscore. *accessTextObject**accessTextObject* The . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个访问键，用于自定义访问键的第一个字母（其中包含助记键），然后使用属性设置文本的其余部分 。The following example creates an access key that customizes the first letter of the access key, which contains the mnemonic, and then sets the rest of the text by using the property. [!code-xaml[AccessTextProps_snip#AccessTextText](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AccessTextProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#accesstexttext)]

summary.span: 获取或设置添加到 元素的文本的修饰。

span.span: Gets or sets the decorations that are added to the text of an element.
The applied to the text of an .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about text decorations, see . 通常不使用标记或代码设置此属性。This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code. 此属性公开访问键的默认修饰 (与文本) 相同文本颜色的下划线，以便进行可能的样式设置或编程更改。This property exposes the default decoration for an access key (an underline in the same text color as the text) for possible styling or programmatic change. 由于用户希望访问密钥标识符在中具有特定外观，因此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 更好的选择是使用应用程序范围的机制（例如应用程序样式或自定义主题）更改此属性。Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreTextDecorations**OneOrMoreTextDecorations* 一个或多个 元素。One or more elements. 如果要定义自定义文本修饰，请使用此语法。Use this syntax if you are defining custom text decorations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：创建文本修饰](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration)。For details, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
